message.content:
<<<api>>>: RelativeLayout.LayoutParams
<<<code>>>: i = 0;
for(String s : alist) {
    TextView textview = (TextView) inflater.inflate(R.layout.tag_keyword,null);
    textview.setText(s);
    textview.setId(2000 + i);
    
    RelativeLayout.LayoutParams rlp2 = new RelativeLayout.LayoutParams(
            RelativeLayout.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT,
            RelativeLayout.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT);
    
    if (i == 0) {
        rlp2.addRule(RelativeLayout.ALIGN_PARENT_TOP);
        rlp2.addRule(RelativeLayout.ALIGN_PARENT_LEFT);
        textview.setLayoutParams(rlp2);
        fl.addView(textview);
    } else {
        rlp2.setMargins(10,0, 10,0);
        rlp2.addRule(RelativeLayout.RIGHT_OF, textview.getId() - 1);
        textview.setLayoutParams(rlp2);
        fl.addView(textview);
    }
    
    i++;
}
<<<explanation>>>: The issue is with the placement of the `i++` statement. It should be placed at the end of the loop, after adding the textview to the relative layout. This will ensure that the `i` value is incremented correctly for each iteration.
